ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor?
The primary instructor's sensitivity to students and ability to provide students with adequate feedback was:

narratives.question_text: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course:
comments: 4 hours
Variable (2-15)

narratives.question_text: Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: It's a good course.

Although the course material could be very difficult, the overall organization and execution of the course made the material manageable. I feel that I was consistently challenged during the course, and that I have definitely learned a lot of material throughout the semester.
Much things were talked about, but not detailed enough. After the course, I feel I only got a superficial understanding of GLM.

Strengths:- The class notes are very informative and complement the textbook very well.- Reading the notes (slides and the ones in class) together with the book is not only helpful in learning GLM but also a good practice for reading theoretical material.
this is a very hard class that takes a lot of time to study. but it is very useful for future research
was an average course. Learned some materials.

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Instructor: Shuangge Ma  He teaches very well.

Instructor: Shuangge Ma  I think last problem of first homework and the first problem of the midterm are wrong. These two questions are about m-estimation and I don't think he made the right assumption. Furthermore the explanation to the problem he wrote in his email was problematic. But the course is good overall.
Instructor: Shuangge Ma  The course notes were very nicely laid out, and were extremely helpful in learning the course material and completely required assignments.
Instructor: Shuangge Ma  - The notes were very well written and the lectures were well prepared and time efficient.
Instructor: Shuangge Ma  helpful after class and nice to talk about the outside-class materials. reachable and encouraging

Instructor: Shuangge Ma  Was an interesting instructor who is very intelligent but perhaps need improvements on teaching skills. Also if solutions to problems/exams are provided, course would run better.

narratives.question_text: If this course included instruction by a teaching assistant (TA), please evaluate the TA here. What are the strengths and weaknesses and how might their teaching be improved? (Specify name of the TA).
comments: Instructor: Qing Zhao  She did a good job.
Instructor: Qing Zhao  I don't think she prepared well enough for the office hour.
Instructor: Qing Zhao  - Helpful TA and gave useful feedback on the HW.
Instructor: Qing Zhao  okay for getting help from, nice but sometimes not prepared good for TA sessions
Instructor: Qing Zhao  Not sure of her capabilities, seemed to me unable at times to answer questions.

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes.
- Good Learning Experience
very challenging class, need a lot work to do!! maybe make it easier for masters and first year phd students
Overall much needed course for biostatistic student. Nice professor who has a lot of knowledge, perhaps improvement on how to give help to students could improve the course.
